## Description {#details}

Verify that every instruction created has the same <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dilocation">DILocation</a> as the instruction being translated.

### createdInstr() {#ae7b4929f666367f947806ba2fab9cecf}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;IRTranslator.cpp&#125;::DILocationVerifier::createdInstr (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
An instruction has been created and inserted into the function.

Note that the instruction might not be a fully fledged instruction at this point and won&#39;t be if the MachineFunction::Delegate is calling it. This is because the delegate only sees the construction of the MachineInstr before operands have been added.
